## Teach Agents New Skills & Reuse via Automated Chat

```Python
This notebook demonstrates teaching new skills to agents and enabling their reuse in automated chats.
It covers the process of imparting knowledge and capabilities to AI agents for educational purposes.
Dependencies: AutoGen, Jupyter Notebook.
Input: New skills and data for agent training.
Output: Agents capable of performing new tasks and skills.
```

## Monitor LLM Calls and Errors with AgentOps

```Python
import autogen
from autogen.agentchat.contrib.agentops import AgentOps

# Initialize AutoGen agents
config_list = [{"model": "gpt-4", "api_key": "YOUR_API_KEY"}]
llm_config = {"config_list": config_list, "temperature": 0}

user_proxy = autogen.UserProxyAgent(
    name="UserProxy",
    human_input_mode="ALWAYS",
    code_execution_config=False,
    llm_config=llm_config,
)

# Initialize AgentOps with your AgentOps API key and project ID
agent_ops = AgentOps(agentops_api_key="YOUR_AGENTOPS_API_KEY", project_id="YOUR_PROJECT_ID")

# Wrap agents with AgentOps for monitoring
monitored_user_proxy = agent_ops.monitor(user_proxy)

# Define other agents and initiate conversation...
# monitored_user_proxy.initiate_chat(..., ...)
```

## Hello-World Chat with OpenAI Assistant in AutoGen

```Python
This notebook provides a basic example of chatting with an OpenAI Assistant using AutoGen.
It serves as a fundamental introduction to multi-agent chat with AI assistants.
Dependencies: AutoGen, OpenAI API, Jupyter Notebook.
Input: User query and OpenAI Assistant configuration.
Output: Conversational response from the OpenAI Assistant.
```

## Long Context Handling in AI Workflows

```Python
from autogen import UserProxyAgent, AssistantAgent\n\n# Configure agents for long context processing\long_context_agent = AssistantAgent(name="long_context_agent", llm_config={"model": "gpt-4-turbo", "temperature": 0.5, ...})\nuser_proxy = UserProxyAgent(name="user_proxy")\n\n# Example: Processing a long document\long_document = "..." * 1000 # Simulate a long text\nuser_proxy.initiate_chat(long_context_agent, message=f"Summarize the key points from the following document:\
{long_document}")
```

## Teach Agents New Facts, User Preferences and Skills Beyond Coding

```Python
This notebook shows how to teach agents new facts, user preferences, and non-coding skills.
It highlights the versatility of agent learning beyond traditional coding tasks.

Input: Factual information, user preferences, and skill descriptions.
Output: Agents with enhanced knowledge and understanding of user needs.
```
